Rulings.Base:
1. Making your Life Points become 4000 starts a Chain.
2. You can make your Life Points become 4000 even if you have more than 4000 Life Points.
3. You cannot activate the effect to make your Life Points become 4000 if you have exactly 4000 Life Points.
4. You remove from play 1 Equip Spell Card to prevent this card from being destroyed at the moment it would be destroyed.
5. [FORUM] You can activate the first effect of "Life Stream Dragon" if you have more or less than 4000 Life Points. This means if you have 500 Life Points, when the effect resolves, your Life Points will be 4000. It also means that if you have 98,000 Life Points, when the effect resolves, your Life Points will be 4000.
